channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Overhanging branches on Rectory Lane by the church, 15th August
item.description:
This has today damaged my vehicle it's overhanging onto the carriageway and with two vehicles driving past at the same time you can't pass by ina larger vehicle. How do I make a claim for the damage caused to my vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Osier Lane sign mangled, 15th August
item.description:
The sign for Osier Lane is mangled, most likely after a vehicle collision.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Osier Lane, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Fly tipping of fridge and rubbish, 15th August
item.description:
Reported this fly tipping of fridge and rubbish along the road several times over several weeks but nothing has been done. This reflects badly on the council and the environment. Please do something about this quickly. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Borthwick Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road drainage gulley blocked, 15th August
item.description:
Road drainage gulley outside my house at 65 Normandy way is blocked probably due to the Thames water works going on outside my house. It is giving off a gas like smell and is really strong. Even called the gas emergency thinking it was and they said it was the drain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Normandy Way, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abuse of trees in Beckenham Green, 15th August
item.description:
Please would you kindly arrange for BeckFit not to abuse the Beckenham Green trees as pieces of gymnasium equipment, or just ban the group from hiring the Green. Attached screenshot from their posting on Beckenham Appreciation Society FB site 15/8/25.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many Lime bikes blocking street / road., 15th August
item.description:
Every day, a ridiculous number of Like bikes are left at this location, block cars and pedestrians. Also it causes a large gathering of people late at night which is very loud in a residential area. Many complaints have been submitted and yet the problems persist.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-13, Triangle Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
